message.body: Hey! So I'm in Monterey with the seals now, sf this afternoon. We're thinking lucky 13 tomorrow evening?
I will keep you posted! Not sure what's up tonight yet either...
Alright I'm up for whatever. Storm passed, nice weather today!
Headed to toronado if you're around tonight? If not, hasta mañana!
Ok maybe in an hour or so if you're there.
Awesome! I'll let you know if we go elsewhere.
I live a few blocks from toronado so I'll try to catch you there
It is pretty awful in here so I will keep you posted. I have a porter now though so maybe it will be ok!
Yeah toronado is always packed on Saturdays.
I need some takeout, is it standing only in there?
So, there's 8 of us is the thing! We're trying to figure out phase 2 now.
New idea: I pick up some beer along with my dinner and you guys come over and drink with the Ern-worm.
Ok maybe not I have only 5-7 seats. I desperately need food though so I'm going to go get some now.
Yeah! You eat & I'll let you know when we escape.
Ok step 2: thieves tavern. Leaving beer hell now!
Also very close to me, I'll head down for a whiskey after I eat my burger.
